current_company.name: NIRA

experience.title: Lead Credit Strategist
experience.description: Nira provides instant personal loans to middle income segment in India. Working with Data Sci-ence, Credit, Tech and Growth teams to improve unit economics and manage risk of Personal Loans.Alongside, leading a team of 4 data scientists and engineers.• Increased approval rates by 20% and ticket size by 80% through cohort analysis• Reduced credit underwriting operational costs by 50% through automation of approvals whilemaintaining low NPAs• Improved risk management by developing a credit scoring model• Launched personal loans for Self Employed segment• Identified product improvements to increase user retention• Reduced CAC by removing external APIs for Bank Statement analysis by building in-house solution• Improved transparency of models to business stakeholders by streamlining documentation andprocesses
experience.description_html: Nira provides instant personal loans to middle income segment in India. Working with Data Sci-ence, Credit, Tech and Growth teams to improve unit economics and manage risk of Personal Loans.Alongside, leading a team of 4 data scientists and engineers.• Increased approval rates by 20% and ticket size by 80% through cohort analysis• Reduced credit underwriting operational costs by 50% through automation of approvals whilemaintaining low NPAs• Improved risk management by developing a credit scoring model• Launched personal loans for Self Employed segment• Identified product improvements to increase user retention• Reduced CAC by removing external APIs for Bank Statement analysis by building in-house solution• Improved transparency of models to business stakeholders by streamlining documentation andprocesses

positions.subtitle: Goldman Sachs
positions.description: Leading a team of six mortgages structuring strats in Bangalore, responsible for structuring andpricing of RMBS and ABS securitizations in EMEA and APAC regions• Lending Platforms– Designed different home loan products based on market demand and opportunity– Analysed the impact of different loan features on advance rates by developing rating agencymodels for securitization of the projected loan portfolio– Created securitization structures and waterfalls incorporating investor preferences and estimated securitization exit price of different loan products in different economic scenarios– Back-solved mortgage rates for different loan products to optimise demand/PnL of origination– Launched lending platforms in Japan, UK and Netherlands and securitized the loan portfolios– Structured senior financing deals for fintech startups in Europe and India• Loan Portfolio Pricing– Priced different European asset backed PL/RPL/SPL portfolios based on rated securitisation Exit– Developed rating agency models to estimate PD LGD on the portfolio in different rating scenarios– Created innovative structures and waterfalls to maximize securitisation exit price• Key contributions– Improved team efficiency and turn around times by developing automation tools, documentations and creating knowledge sharing processes– Improved collaboration with different teams and work allocation
positions.title: Vice President - Mortgage Structuring Strat
positions.description_html:
Leading a team of six mortgages structuring strats in Bangalore, responsible for structuring and
pricing of RMBS and ABS securitizations in EMEA and APAC regions

• Lending Platforms
– Designed different home loan products based on market demand and opportunity
– Analysed the impact of different loan features on advance rates by developing rating agency
models for securitization of the projected loan portfolio
– Created securitization structures and waterfalls incorporating investor preferences and estimated securitization exit price of different loan products in different economic scenarios
– Back-solved mortgage rates for different loan products to optimise demand/PnL of origination
– Launched lending platforms in Japan, UK and Netherlands and securitized the loan portfolios
– Structured senior financing deals for fintech startups in Europe and India

• Loan Portfolio Pricing
– Priced different European asset backed PL/RPL/SPL portfolios based on rated securitisation Exit
– Developed rating agency models to estimate PD LGD on the portfolio in different rating scenarios
– Created innovative structures and waterfalls to maximize securitisation exit price

• Key contributions
– Improved team efficiency and turn around times by developing automation tools, documentations and creating knowledge sharing processes
– Improved collaboration with different teams and work allocation

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: • Worked on functional and performance improvement of Java based Portfolio Accounting System• Developed an end to end application to detect potential outliers in portfolio characteristics data• Completed 4 months of training in Java, C++, Software Engineering, Unix, Financial Markets, InvestmentBanking, Derivatives Pricing, Portfolio Management and Quantitative Analysis in Finance
experience.description_html: • Worked on functional and performance improvement of Java based Portfolio Accounting System• Developed an end to end application to detect potential outliers in portfolio characteristics data• Completed 4 months of training in Java, C++, Software Engineering, Unix, Financial Markets, InvestmentBanking, Derivatives Pricing, Portfolio Management and Quantitative Analysis in Finance <!---->

experience.title: Undergraduate Student
experience.description: Identification of Intrinsically Disordered Proteins using Machine Learning • Developed feature set out of attributes of the amino acid sequence for Random Forest classifier• Developed a baseline using existing disorder prediction programs namely SLIDER, ANCHOR, IUPRED• Achieved a classification accuracy of 89% for 1539 protein sequences taken from Disprod databasePromoter prediction using machine learning • Used supervised learning to identify promoter sequences in the genome of Entamoeba Invadens• Classified the predicted sequences into encystation specific and non-specific promoters using SVMOpinion dynamics in social network • Developed an algorithm to find minimum number of nodes to be controlled in a network so thatthe network gives a desired final opinion; used Google PageRank algorithm to identify driver nodes• Developed a linear model for asynchronous opinion dynamics; using regression found the influencematrix of the network data gathered from Twitter and Reddit
experience.description_html: Identification of Intrinsically Disordered Proteins using Machine Learning • Developed feature set out of attributes of the amino acid sequence for Random Forest classifier• Developed a baseline using existing disorder prediction programs namely SLIDER, ANCHOR, IUPRED• Achieved a classification accuracy of 89% for 1539 protein sequences taken from Disprod databasePromoter prediction using machine learning • Used supervised learning to identify promoter sequences in the genome of Entamoeba Invadens• Classified the predicted sequences into encystation specific and non-specific promoters using SVMOpinion dynamics in social network • Developed an algorithm to find minimum number of nodes to be controlled in a network so thatthe network gives a desired final opinion; used Google PageRank algorithm to identify driver nodes• Developed a linear model for asynchronous opinion dynamics; using regression found the influencematrix of the network data gathered from Twitter and Reddit

experience.title: Summer Research Intern
experience.description: The internship was supported by MITACS Globalink Fellowship Grant. Worked on two different projects under Prof. Russ Greiner, Department of Computing Science.1. Used supervised learning (Gaussian process regression and Support vector regression) to learn a model to forecast a Type 1 Diabetes patient's Blood Glucose level at the time of next meal given the patient's Diabetes diary. The data is gathered for real patients using a mobile application called EASI-IDM.  2. Used supervised and reinforcement learning techniques to best adjust the Type 1 Diabetes patient’s current policy of insulin injection, to improve the long-term "reward" using the data generated by T1DM simulator.
experience.description_html: The internship was supported by MITACS Globalink Fellowship Grant. Worked on two different projects under Prof. Russ Greiner, Department of Computing Science.1. Used supervised learning (Gaussian process regression and Support vector regression) to learn a model to forecast a Type 1 Diabetes patient's Blood Glucose level at the time of next meal given the patient's Diabetes diary. The data is gathered for real patients using a mobile application called EASI-IDM. 2. Used supervised and reinforcement learning techniques to best adjust the Type 1 Diabetes patient’s current policy of insulin injection, to improve the long-term "reward" using the data generated by T1DM simulator.

experience.title: Software engineer intern
experience.description: Worked on functional improvement of auto-testing tools - Developed a search tool for searching test-cases in an auto-testing tool called JMent  - Developed another search tool for searching files with similar HTML in an auto-testing tool Howl,        generated on execution of tests .   - Fixed a number of bugs in JMentWorked on java, javascript, sql, used Play framework.
